abstracts.cdata!:
The Medium Size Cities Water Supply
            Project consists of seven sub-projects designed to increase
            water treatment and storage capacities and to improve water
            distribution. With the exception of sub-projects in
            Buenaventura and Santa Marta, sewerage works are also included.
